md "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/arm64-v8a" >NUL 2>NUL || rem
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "Gdbserver      ": "[aarch64-{platform}-android-4.9] libs/arm64-v8a/gdbserver"
copy /b/y "{ndkPath}/prebuilt/android-arm64/gdbserver/gdbserver" "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/arm64-v8a/gdbserver" > NUL
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "Gdbsetup       ": "libs/arm64-v8a/gdb.setup"
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe "set solib-search-path {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a" > {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/arm64-v8a/gdb.setup
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe "source {ndkPath}/prebuilt/common/gdb/common.setup" >> {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/arm64-v8a/gdb.setup
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe "directory {ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-arm64/usr/include {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni {ndkPath}/sources/cxx-stl/system" >> {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/arm64-v8a/gdb.setup

{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "Compile        ": "sanangeles <= importgl.c"
{ndkPath}/toolchains/llvm-3.6/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/clang.exe -MMD -MP -MF {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/importgl.o.d -gcc-toolchain {ndkPath}/toolchains/aarch64-{platform}-android-4.9/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64 -target aarch64-none-{platform}-android -ffunction-sections -funwind-tables -fstack-protector-strong -fpic -Wno-invalid-command-line-argument -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -no-canonical-prefixes -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fomit-frame-pointer -fstrict-aliasing -O0 -UNDEBUG -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fno-strict-aliasing -I{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni -DANDROID -DANDROID_NDK -DDISABLE_IMPORTGL -Wa,--noexecstack -Wformat -Werror=format-security    -I{ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-arm64/usr/include -c  {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni/importgl.c -o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/importgl.o 
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "Compile        ": "sanangeles <= demo.c"
{ndkPath}/toolchains/llvm-3.6/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/clang.exe -MMD -MP -MF {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/demo.o.d -gcc-toolchain {ndkPath}/toolchains/aarch64-{platform}-android-4.9/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64 -target aarch64-none-{platform}-android -ffunction-sections -funwind-tables -fstack-protector-strong -fpic -Wno-invalid-command-line-argument -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -no-canonical-prefixes -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fomit-frame-pointer -fstrict-aliasing -O0 -UNDEBUG -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fno-strict-aliasing -I{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni -DANDROID -DANDROID_NDK -DDISABLE_IMPORTGL -Wa,--noexecstack -Wformat -Werror=format-security    -I{ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-arm64/usr/include -c  {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni/demo.c -o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/demo.o 
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "Compile        ": "sanangeles <= app-android.c"
{ndkPath}/toolchains/llvm-3.6/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/clang.exe -MMD -MP -MF {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/app-android.o.d -gcc-toolchain {ndkPath}/toolchains/aarch64-{platform}-android-4.9/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64 -target aarch64-none-{platform}-android -ffunction-sections -funwind-tables -fstack-protector-strong -fpic -Wno-invalid-command-line-argument -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -no-canonical-prefixes -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fomit-frame-pointer -fstrict-aliasing -O0 -UNDEBUG -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fno-strict-aliasing -I{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni -DANDROID -DANDROID_NDK -DDISABLE_IMPORTGL -Wa,--noexecstack -Wformat -Werror=format-security    -I{ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-arm64/usr/include -c  {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni/app-android.c -o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/app-android.o 
md "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a" >NUL 2>NUL || rem
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "SharedLibrary  ": "libsanangeles.so"
{ndkPath}/toolchains/llvm-3.6/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/clang++.exe -Wl,-soname,libsanangeles.so -shared --sysroot={ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-arm64 {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/importgl.o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/demo.o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/objs-debug/sanangeles/app-android.o -lgcc  -gcc-toolchain {ndkPath}/toolchains/aarch64-{platform}-android-4.9/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64 -target aarch64-none-{platform}-android -no-canonical-prefixes  -Wl,--no-undefined -Wl,-z,noexecstack -Wl,-z,relro -Wl,-z,now  -L{ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-arm64/usr/lib -lGLESv1_CM -ldl -llog -lc -lm -o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/libsanangeles.so
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [arm64-v8a] "Install        ": "libsanangeles.so => libs/arm64-v8a/libsanangeles.so"
copy /b/y "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/arm64-v8a/libsanangeles.so" "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/arm64-v8a/libsanangeles.so" > NUL

md "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/x86_64/objs-debug/sanangeles" >NUL 2>NUL || rem

md "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/mips64" >NUL 2>NUL || rem
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [mips64] "SharedLibrary  ": "libsanangeles.so"
{ndkPath}/toolchains/llvm-3.6/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/clang++.exe -Wl,-soname,libsanangeles.so -shared --sysroot={ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-mips64 {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/mips64/objs-debug/sanangeles/importgl.o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/mips64/objs-debug/sanangeles/demo.o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/mips64/objs-debug/sanangeles/app-android.o -lgcc  -gcc-toolchain {ndkPath}/toolchains/mips64el-{platform}-android-4.9/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64 -target mips64el-none-{platform}-android -no-canonical-prefixes  -Wl,--no-undefined -Wl,-z,noexecstack -Wl,-z,relro -Wl,-z,now  -L{ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-mips64/usr/lib64 -L{ndkPath}/platforms/android-21/arch-mips64/usr/lib -lGLESv1_CM -ldl -llog -lc -lm -o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/mips64/libsanangeles.so
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [mips64] "Install        ": "libsanangeles.so => libs/mips64/libsanangeles.so"
copy /b/y "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/mips64/libsanangeles.so" "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/libs/mips64/libsanangeles.so" > NUL

md "{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/objs-debug/sanangeles" >NUL 2>NUL || rem
{ndkPath}/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/echo.exe [armeabi-v7a] "Compile thumb  ": "sanangeles <= importgl.c"
{ndkPath}/toolchains/llvm-3.6/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64/bin/clang.exe -MMD -MP -MF {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/objs-debug/sanangeles/importgl.o.d -gcc-toolchain {ndkPath}/toolchains/arm-{platform}-androideabi-4.8/prebuilt/{platform}-x86_64 -fpic -ffunction-sections -funwind-tables -fstack-protector-strong -Wno-invalid-command-line-argument -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -no-canonical-prefixes -fno-integrated-as  -target armv7-none-{platform}-androideabi -march=armv7-a -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=vfpv3-d16 -mthumb -Os -g -DNDEBUG -fomit-frame-pointer -fno-strict-aliasing -O0 -UNDEBUG -marm -fno-omit-frame-pointer -I{ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni -DANDROID -DANDROID_NDK -DDISABLE_IMPORTGL -Wa,--noexecstack -Wformat -Werror=format-security    -I{ndkPath}/platforms/android-4/arch-arm/usr/include -c  {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/jni/importgl.c -o {ndkPath}/samples/san-angeles/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/objs-debug/sanangeles/importgl.o
